mapper.insert: insert into t_byumen (byumenId, byumenName, byumenMark, byumenMark1, byumenMark2, byumenType, byumenType1, byumenType2, byumenDouble, byumenDouble1, byumenDouble2, byuyuanId, byuyuanName) values (#{byumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{byumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byumenMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byumenMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byumenMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byumenType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{byumenType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{byumenType2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{byumenDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{byumenDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{byumenDouble2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{byuyuanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{byuyuanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_byumen set byumenName = #{byumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, byumenMark = #{byumenMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, byumenMark1 = #{byumenMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, byumenMark2 = #{byumenMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, byumenType = #{byumenType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, byumenType1 = #{byumenType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, byumenType2 = #{byumenType2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, byumenDouble = #{byumenDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, byumenDouble1 = #{byumenDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, byumenDouble2 = #{byumenDouble2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, byuyuanId = #{byuyuanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, byuyuanName = #{byuyuanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where byumenId = #{byumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select byumenId, byumenName, byumenMark, byumenMark1, byumenMark2, byumenType, byumenType1, byumenType2, byumenDouble, byumenDouble1, byumenDouble2, byuyuanId, byuyuanName from t_byumen where byumenId = #{byumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
